argument.name: pct
argument.description: The percentage completion to show on the progress bar. The range is 0 to 100. Numeric

page.description: Sets the percentage of wait dialog. Set pct to 100 to close.
page.discussion: The ProgressPercent() function displays a static progress bar. It is up to the programmer to call it with different values. ProgressPercent(100) closes the progress bar. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
